title: [Underway, Topmost]
description: Pale golden pools of radiance spill from enchanted sunstones, lighting the walls and floor of the tunnel as it burrows down into the bowels of the mountain.  Moonlight spills in through a cut stone archway, and beyond it a stone bridge reaches across a chasm to the white granite of a fortified highroad.

Pale golden pools of radiance spill from enchanted sunstones, lighting the walls and floor of the tunnel as it burrows down into the bowels of the mountain.  Daylight floods in through a cut stone archway, and beyond it a stone bridge reaches across a chasm to the white granite of a fortified highroad.
